turns.content: Did the Houston Oilers' arrival in the NFL lead to changes in how other cities viewed Houston as a sports town?

I cannot speculate on the opinions and views of cities regarding houston as a sports town, but the arrival of the houston oilers in the nfl did mark a significant change in the city's sports landscape. the oilers were the first major professional sports team in houston and their arrival helped to establish the city as a major player in the sports world. the team's success on the field, including two afl championships in the 1960s, helped to build pride and enthusiasm among houston sports fans. additionally, the oilers' arrival spurred the development of the astrodome, which became a model for indoor sports stadiums around the world. so, while it may not have directly changed how other cities viewed houston as a sports town, the oilers' arrival certainly had a significant impact on the city's sports culture and infrastructure.
Interesting. Were there any other notable sports teams to come out of Houston after the Oilers? I'm curious about the city's sports history.

Yes, there have been several notable sports teams to come out of Houston since the Oilers. The Houston Rockets, a professional basketball team, were established in 1967 and have won two NBA championships in 1994 and 1995. The Houston Astros, a professional baseball team, were established in 1962 and have won one World Series in 2017. The Houston Texans, a professional football team, were established in 2002 as a replacement for the Oilers after they moved to Tennessee in 1997. 

Houston has also been a major center for college athletics. The University of Houston Cougars football team has had several successful seasons over the years, and the men's basketball team has made several trips to the NCAA Tournament. The Rice University Owls have also fielded successful teams in various sports, including baseball and women's volleyball.

Overall, Houston has a rich sports history and has been home to many successful sports teams over the years.
I don't really care about the past, what are the current top sports teams in Houston?

in the nfl, the houston texans are currently the city's professional football team, and while they have had mixed success, they are still considered one of the top teams in the league.

in the mlb, the houston astros have been one of the top teams in recent years, winning the world series in 2017 and losing in the world series in 2019. 

in addition, houston has other notable sports teams such as the mls team houston dynamo, the wnba team houston comets, and the professional rugby team houston sabercats.
